Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2012 05:22PM suz46 wrote: I would also like to congratulate you on the new job and wish you a long successful career with them!  I also agree with the rest, as someone who worked in recrutment for a while, keep it all very close.  Don't share any more than necessary and know their socks off!
